FAQ.Question: Can you mail creatures?
FAQ.Answer: Although more sturdy than your average pet, they are still pups so you must pick them up in person.

FAQ.Question: Can I resell?
FAQ.Answer: No. If a creature doesn't match with your vibes, you can return them to us.

FAQ.Question: How long does it take for adoption?
FAQ.Answer: It will take 1-2 weeks to handle pre-adoption paperwork, then around three days to get your creature ready!

FAQ.Question: Can I adopt if I live abroad?
FAQ.Answer: Yes! As long as you can make it to HQ, you can adopt!

FAQ.Question: I want a creature but they aren't adoptable, will another come back?
FAQ.Answer: Our website constantly updates its creatures, stay tuned for when your favorite species comes back!
